p: Based on previous determinations, these minerals in hemp seeds and flour cover rather wide ranges. The values determined in the current study were below the ones by Mihoc et al. [ 34] but were in line with Zerihun et al. [ 35]. This discrepancy may be due to different reasons: (a) A different soil composition; (b) differences in crop annuity; (c) the use of fertilizers based on nitrogen, which can influence the highlighted relationship between increased nitrogen fertilizer and Na reduction in plants [ 36].
